Description: US Buyers: No taxes, duties or brokerage fees Guitar comes with OHSC in excellent condition, signed checklist and case candy Case is in excellent condition. Some light wear on the top. Inside is pristine Overall condition: - Frets are in excellent condition - Neck is straight - All electronics work as they should - A few small bumps in the finish on the sides of the body - Surface scratches, mostly invisible on the pictures - No buckle wear - Small scratches on the headstock Specifications: - Weight: 10 lbs 1 oz - Factory Bigsby mounted on a Vibramate ( no holes drilled into the body) - Vibramate string spoiler for easy strings installation - '57 Classic Zebra Pickups - '60 Slim taper neck - Grover locking tuners - Extra-thick Rosewood fretboard with Rolled binding - Switchcraft 3-position pickup selector - 2-piece maple top and mahogany body with 9-port weight relief - Switchcraft 3-position pickup selector Some suggestions: Please note that some settings on this guitar like action, intonation, neck adjustment etc .....may need to be adjusted to your specific style of playing. Also once you have received the guitar you should leave the instrument in the case for at least 6 hours, so the instrument can acclimate to its new environment Return and refund procedure: Item can be returned within 3 days of receipt. - Item arrived damaged or not as described: Full refund and seller pays for the return shipping costs - The customer didn't like the item (color, tone, neck size, weight etc....): Full refund less 10% restocking fee and buyer pays for the return shipping costs. - No partial refund. - Refund will be issued once the guitar is back in the sellers hand Carriers: - USPS for the United States - Canada Post for Canada
Title: 2017 Gibson Les Paul Classic Exclusive Run Gold Top with factory Bigsby
